chunk_id: Care During Pregnancy and Childbirth Training Manual for CHO at AB-HWC__chunk_170
source: Care During Pregnancy and Childbirth Training Manual for CHO at AB-HWC
text:
facility whenever required.
 - The contact number of the ambulance or vehicle provided by the state, private or any other provider, 
should be available with You/ANM/ASHA, and should be communicated to the pregnant woman and her 
family members.
 - If a vehicle is not available in the village, help of the panchayat, village health committee, Mahila Mandals, 
youth groups or any other such groups can be taken to decide on how to obtain a vehicle in case of an 
emergency.
